description: Better hope your games aren't on your SD card because holy heck, it is convoluted.
This is the best modern emulator for NES, very precise, and the flatpak runs excellent.
I had issues with crashing when loading a ROM. However, installing straight from the official Fedora repo, no issues.
It works but keep in mind to not use fullscreen mode because it disables the menu and there is no shortcut key to return to windowed mode. I've tried F11 and Alt+Return and they didn't work.

no support for coins
no support for modern controllers
if you want to use fullscreen exit by pressing esc.

i played super mario bros 3 then i downloaded super mario bros 2 then i opened nestopia but i diden'tsee any file settings or anything? i installed it delete install delete install it keeped that black screen.
summary: at start it worked but when i tryed it again it didn't work

description: real good. makes shiggy miyamoto cry with joy

The app functions, but barely. Putting it into fullscreen doesn't center the window and needs to be manually moved, it's unclear how to get out of fullscreen mode without closing the application, I can configure the keyboard for the controls but it isn't detecting my 8bitdo SN30 pro.
summary: input lag, not detecting my controller

description: If you try to set the emulator on fullscreen, it fails, only change the window size. Better try to make a flatpak of PuNES a better, modern and convenient NES emulator.
